note.p: Merchant. In Valparaiso, Chile. Probably the son of Thomas Patrickson of Blackheath, who died in Buenos Aires in 1819. Partner in the firm Sewell and Patrickson in Chile. Married Frances Christopher Nugent White, daughter of John White, the British vice-consul, in Valparaiso, 1828. Father of Thomas [Edmund], George Charles, Philip John and Oriana Patrickson.
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/1628/20)
